# Flight overview

```{r}
pyuthan_fortified <- fortify(pyuthan, id = OBJECTID)
nepal_fortified <- fortify(nep0, id = OBJECTID)
g1 <- ggplot(data = nepal_fortified,
       aes(x = long,
           y = lat)) +
  geom_polygon() +
  theme_databrew() +
  coord_map() +
  theme(axis.text = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_blank()) +
  geom_polygon(data = pyuthan_fortified,
               aes(x = long,
                   y = lat),
               fill = 'darkorange') +
  geom_path(data = fp,
            aes(x = x,
                y = y),
            color = 'darkorange') +
  labs(title = 'Nepal')
g2 <-  ggplot(data = pyuthan_fortified,
       aes(x = long,
           y = lat)) +
  geom_polygon() +
  geom_path(data = fp,
            aes(x = x,
                y = y),
            color = 'darkorange') +
  theme_databrew() +
  coord_map() +
  theme(axis.text = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_blank()) +
  labs(title = 'Pyuthan district')
Rmisc::multiplot(g1, g2, cols = 2)
```

# Population centers

```{r}
library(ggthemes)
test_spdf <- as(nepal::pyuthan_population, "SpatialPixelsDataFrame")
test_df <- as.data.frame(test_spdf)
colnames(test_df) <- c("value", "x", "y")
ggplot() +  
  geom_tile(data=test_df, aes(x=x, y=y, fill=value), alpha=0.8) + 
  # scale_fill_viridis() +
  coord_equal() +
  theme_map() +
  theme(legend.position="bottom") +
  theme(legend.key.width=unit(2, "cm")) +
  scale_fill_gradientn(colours = terrain.colors(10),
                       limits=c(0,ceiling(max(test_df$value))),  
                 space = "Lab",name=paste("People per\nSquared Km. \n"),na.value = NA) +
  geom_path(data = fp,
            aes(x = x,
                y = y),
            color = 'darkorange')
```
